text.div:
retrieve-index

OPERATION: Retrieve logical resource IDs of resources available to reindex

The retrieve-index operation retrieves the logical resource IDs from the database. These logical resource IDs can then be passed into the reindex operation to indicate the specific resources to reindex.

URL: [base]/$retrieve-index

name: RetrieveIndex
description: The retrieve-index operation retrieves the logical resource IDs from the database.

parameter.name: _count
parameter.documentation: The maximum number of logical resource IDs to retrieve. This may not exceed 1000. If not specified, the maxinum number retrieved is 1000.

parameter.name: notModifiedAfter
parameter.documentation: Only retrieve logical resource IDs for resources not last updated after this timestamp. Format as a date YYYY-MM-DD or time YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.

parameter.name: afterLogicalResourceId
parameter.documentation: Retrieve logical resource IDs starting with the first logical resource ID after this logical resource ID. If this parameter is not specified, the retrieved logical resource IDs start with the first logical resource ID.

parameter.name: logicalResourceIds
parameter.documentation: The logical resource IDs, formatted as a comma-delimited list of strings. This parameter is not returned if there are no logical resource IDs retrieved.
